stimulusHtml: Which of the following best describes the condition in which this code segment always results in integer overflow?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment. Assume that the  int  variable  input  has been properly declared and initialized. 

 

int answer = 1;
if (input != 0)  
{
   int count = 1; 
       
   while (count != input) 
   { 
      count++; 
      answer *= count;            
   }
} 
       
System.out.println(answer);
